scenarios.name: Infected Warriors
rewards: Each character gains one random “Orb” item (Item 1-10)

scenarios.name: Blood of the Oozes
rewards: Each character gains one random “Orb” item (Item 1-10)

scenarios.name: Corpse Cavern
rewards:
Each character gains one of the following: “Major Stamina Potion” (Item 34), “Major Power Potion” (Item 41), “Major Mana Potion” (Item 48)
If there are non of these available in the shop, gain 20 gold instead

scenarios.name: Ambush of Beasts
rewards: Each character gains one random “Orb” item (Item 1-10)

scenarios.name: Preto Krisanta

treasures.6: Gain 20 gold and disarm all adjacent traps

rewards: One character gains one {+1_WHITE} enhancement to any Level 1 or X card

treasures.19: Gain ✓ and generate a Wild Element
treasures.43: 10 experience and Refresh all spent items

scenarios.name: Grab and Go
rewards: 100 gold each. This money must immediately be spent on enhancements

scenarios.name: Midnight Ritual
rewards: Each character gains one random “Orb” item (Item 1-10)

treasures.4: Gain 15 gold and Recover one lost card

scenarios.name: Imp Temple
rewards: Each character gains +2 gold and 2 experience for each money token looted.

scenarios.name: Eerie Grotto
rewards: Each character gains one random “Orb” item (Item 1-10)

scenarios.name: Brightspark, Behold!
rewards: Add Road Event 57 to the deck

scenarios.name: Great Oak Escape
rewards: All characters add one {BLESS} to their attack modifer deck for the next scenario

scenarios.name: Festering Mire
rewards: Remove the top 5 cards from the City Event deck and shuffle City Event 57 into them. Place the remaining City Event cards aside until City Event 57 is resolved. Any additional card that would be added to the City Event deck during this time is added after City Event 57 is resolved and the remaining cards are combined with the original deck.
“An Adder Divides” quest is not yet complete

scenarios.name: Mansion Maze
rewards: Each character gains one random “Orb” item (Item 1-10)

scenarios.name: Haunted Manor
rewards: Each character gains one random “Orb” item (Item 1-10)

scenarios.name: Oak Invasion A
rewards: During the next visit to Gloomhaven, donations to the Sanctuary cost 0 gold

scenarios.name: Penitentiary Lockdown
rewards: Gain one of the following as an item and the other as an item design: “Claw Trap” (Item 34), “Clamp Trap” (Item 56)

scenarios.name: Capstone Test
scenarios.requirements: “Ingenious Inventor” personal quest and “Power Modulator” item equipped
rewards: Gain one of the following: “Steam Piston Hammer” (Item QA02) OR “Spider Climb Gloves” (Item QA03)
Add a copy of the chosen item to the city's available supply
Add the other item to the random item design deck
Add copies to the city's available supply

scenarios.name: Mother Lode
rewards: 15xA gold each (where A is the number of Ancient Scrap recovered
Add City Event QA-03 to the deck

scenarios.name: Unseen Plight
rewards: “Studded Leather” design (Item 030) OR “Boots of Dashing” design (Item 036)

scenarios.name: The Fall of Shadow's Respite
rewards: If at least three Vermlings were alive at the end of the eighth round: 5 gold
If at least five Vermlings were alive at the end of the eighth round: ✓
